title: Rainbow Bridge National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery         Jonathan Parker/NPS  Rainbow Bridge National Monument is one of the finest photographic subjects you will ever encounter. Since the first photograph was taken here on August 14th 1909, thousands of visitors have traveled to Rainbow Bridge to experience the majestic beauty of this geological marvel. Photographs provide the opportunity for visitors to capture and share their experience at Rainbow Bridge. Browse Photographs in the Galleries Below.                       2009 Photo Contest Winners   4 Photos            General Photographs   12 Photos            Historic Photos, Maps, Drawings   11 Photos              Rainbow Bridge Trail Washout September 12, 2013   27 Photos  Heavy rains in early September 2013 caused the trail from the docks to the observation area at Rainbow Bridge National Monument to washout. These pictures are of the damage.
